thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Hyatt Place New York Midtown South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: samanthamD9818PL
title: Excellent
text: Everything was perfect. Complimentary breakfast was wonderful, staff was friendly, check in and check out was seamless. We went to check our bags and roam the city around 11am, but they said they already had our room ready, check in was supposed to be at 4. We were happily surprised by that, check out was at 12, so we didn't feel rushed in leaving either.
